avalancheActivity.comment:
Some snow has fallen since Monday along the border with Switzerland. The wind was moderate to strong in the vicinity of peaks.
The fresh and somewhat older wind slabs can be released, especially by large additional loads, in particular on northwest to east to southeast facing aspects and generally at intermediate and high altitudes. They are to be found especially adjacent to ridgelines and in pass areas.

Above approximately 1200 m snow will fall from early morning. In these regions the avalanche danger will increase gradually. Caution is to be exercised in particular above the tree line.
avalancheActivity.highlights: As a consequence of the precipitation the avalanche prone locations will become more prevalent from midday.

snowpackStructure.comment: Along the border with Switzerland some new snow. In some localities up to 15 cm of snow has fallen since Monday above approximately 2000 m. The northwesterly wind has transported the new snow significantly. In some places new snow and wind slabs are lying on a hard crust. The old snowpack will be generally stable.

tendency.comment: Increase in danger of dry avalanches as the precipitation becomes more intense.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The mostly small wind slabs can be released in isolated cases, but mostly only by large additional loads,. This applies in particular adjacent to ridgelines and in pass areas in particular at high altitudes and in high Alpine regions.

Above approximately 1500 m snow will fall from early morning. In these regions the avalanche danger will increase gradually to level 2 (moderate). Caution is to be exercised in particular above the tree line.
avalancheActivity.highlights: As a consequence of the precipitation the avalanche prone locations will become more prevalent from midday.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The weather conditions gave rise to rapid consolidation of the snowpack. In some places new snow and wind slabs are lying on a hard crust.
In isolated cases wind slabs are lying on old snow containing large grains. This applies especially on shady slopes.

tendency.comment: Increase in danger of dry avalanches as the snowfall becomes more intense.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The mostly small wind slabs can be released in isolated cases, but mostly only by large additional loads,. This applies in particular adjacent to ridgelines and in pass areas in particular at high altitudes and in high Alpine regions. Apart from the danger of being buried, restraint should be exercised in particular in view of the danger of avalanches sweeping people along and giving rise to falls.

Some snow will fall from midday over a wide area. The avalanche danger will increase during the day, reaching danger level 2 (moderate). This applies in particular at intermediate and high altitudes.
avalancheActivity.highlights: As a consequence of the precipitation the avalanche prone locations will become more prevalent from midday.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The weather conditions gave rise to rapid consolidation of the snowpack.
In isolated cases wind slabs are lying on old snow containing large grains. This applies especially on shady slopes.

tendency.comment: Increase in danger of dry avalanches as the precipitation becomes more intense.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The mostly small wind slabs can be released in isolated cases, but mostly only by large additional loads,. This applies in particular adjacent to ridgelines and in pass areas in particular at high altitudes and in high Alpine regions. Apart from the danger of being buried, restraint should be exercised in particular in view of the danger of avalanches sweeping people along and giving rise to falls.

Some snow will fall from midday over a wide area. The avalanche danger will increase a little during the day.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The snowpack will be in most cases well bonded.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The weather conditions gave rise to rapid consolidation of the snowpack.
In isolated cases wind slabs are lying on old snow containing large grains. This applies especially on shady slopes.

tendency.comment: In some regions increase in danger of dry avalanches as a consequence of the snowfall.
